definition: to the greatest distance in space or time (`farthest' is used more often than `furthest' in this physical sense), (comparatives of `far') most remote in space or time or order
details:
adverb
- to the greatest distance in space or time (`farthest' is used more often than `furthest' in this physical sense)
= example: to the greatest distance in space or time (`farthest' is used more often than `furthest' in this physical sense)
= synonyms: furthest
- to the greatest degree or extent, or to the most advanced stage
= example: to the greatest degree or extent, or to the most advanced stage
= synonyms: furthest
adjective
- (comparatives of `far') most remote in space or time or order
= example: (comparatives of `far') most remote in space or time or order
= synonyms: furthest, farthermost, furthermost, utmost, uttermost
